text: Soni chisimu chene twajiguumbiile Jahannama majini gamajinji kwisa soni ŵandu (ŵatakajinjileko), ŵanganyao akwete mitima nambo ŵangamanyilila najo, meso soni akwete nambo ŵangalolela nago, ni mawiwi gakwe akwete nambo ŵangapikanila nago, ŵanganyao ali chisawu inyama, gambakuti ŵanganyao ni ŵali ŵakusokonechela nnope (kumpunda inyama), ŵanganyao ni ŵali ŵaakwaanjila (malamusi ga Allah)
